PADDY McGuinness will continue as the face of Marks & Spencer food adverts following reports his contract had been axed after his split from wife Christine.
The TV presenter, 49 - who announced … [+1644 chars]

articles.author: Laura Williams
articles.title: BBC apologises and tells Miriam Margolyes to leave studio as she swears live on-air - Birmingham Live
articles.description: The BBC have issued 'many apologises'
articles.content: Presenters on BBC Radio 4's Today programme issued "many apologies" to its listeners after actress Miriam Margolyes swore live on air when talking about new chancellor Jeremy Hunt. Miriam was invited… [+1445 chars]
